scripts.buildJs: npx browserify src/js/index.js -t babelify -p tinyify -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.buildCss: npx css-combine src/css/index.css > dist/temp.css && uglifycss dist/temp.css > dist/index.css && rm dist/temp.css
scripts.copyMedia: rimraf dist/img && mkdirp dist/img && cp -R src/img/finalized/* dist/img
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run buildJs" "npm run buildCss" "npm run buildHtml" "npm run copyMedia"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
